coursesOverview.freeVsPremiumDesc: The Free Tier offers a basic experience. Upgrade to Premium for unlimited access to all textbooks, the complete TOPIK exam archive, and deep grammar analysis.
coursesOverview.feature1Desc: <1>Premium Members</1> unlock full digital textbooks from Yonsei, Sogang, SNU, and more. From beginner grammar to advanced reading, content is always up-to-date without buying physical books.
coursesOverview.feature2Desc: Say goodbye to PDF printing. Premium members access 10+ years of TOPIK I & II exams. Automatic grading, weak point analysis, and detailed explanations.
coursesOverview.feature3Desc: Stuck on a sentence? <1 />Our built-in grammar library and syntax system are here.<2 />One-click to break down sentence structure and grammar points, removing blind spots in self-study.

banner.upgradeDesc: You are currently on the <1>Free Tier</1>, with limited access to courses.

hero.desc: But with a scientific method, you can move faster. DuHan combines TOPIK past papers with AI to build a serious score-boosting system.

topik.desc: Not just a PDF download. We rebuilt the real TOPIK computer-based experience‚Äîauto audio, timed reading, and detailed post-test analysis.
topik.point1Desc: No more searching forums. Everything is organized in one place.
topik.point2Desc: See at a glance whether listening or reading is holding you back.

fsrs.desc: Rote memorization is inefficient. DuHan uses the latest Free Spaced Repetition Scheduler to predict when you‚Äôll forget and prompts you exactly at that moment.

ai.desc: Confused by long sentences or subtle endings? Tap any sentence and the AI breaks down grammar, context, and provides examples‚Äîin your language.
ai.userQuestion: What does -Îã§Í∞Ä mean in this sentence?
ai.botAnswer: Here, -Îã§Í∞Ä indicates an action that changes mid-way: while going to school, the second action (meeting a friend) happened before arriving.

toolbox.title: Not even close.
toolbox.subtitle: Click a card below to explore DuHan‚Äôs powerful learning toolbox.
toolbox.card1Desc: Turn your vocab list into A4 dictation sheets. Multiple layouts designed for real handwriting practice.
toolbox.card2Desc: Not just listening‚Äîevery episode comes with an AI-generated, time-synced transcript.
toolbox.card2Point1Desc: Words follow the audio in real time
toolbox.card3Desc: Learn Korean like scrolling TikTok. Don‚Äôt understand the grammar? The AI breaks it down instantly.
toolbox.card3Tip: Hover the purple word to see AI analysis

faq.title: FAQ
faq.q1: Is it suitable for absolute beginners?
faq.a1: Yes. We start from Hangul and provide graded readings aligned with TOPIK1.
faq.q2: Are the TOPIK past papers up to date?
faq.a2: Yes. We include publicly released papers from earlier rounds to the latest available and keep updating.
faq.a3: We offer a 30-day refund guarantee. Email support and we‚Äôll refund you.
